entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 60%

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
